mapper.select: /* MemberClassMapper.getMemberClassList */ SELECT MEMBR_ORGN_CD , MEMBR_CLASS_CD , MEMBR_CLASS_NM , CONCAT(CONCAT('[', CONCAT(MEMBR_CLASS_CD, '] ')), MEMBR_CLASS_NM) AS MEMBR_CLASS_TYPE , DC_RATE , POINT_SAVE_FG , CASE WHEN POINT_SAVE_FG = 1 THEN '%' ELSE '금액' END AS POINT_SAVE_FG_NM , DEFLT_YN , NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT , FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT , MIN_USE_POINT , ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG , CASE WHEN ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG = 1 THEN '생일' ELSE '기념일' END AS ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG_NM , ANVSR_SAVE_POINT , USE_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID , DC_ACC_POINT_YN , MAX_USE_POINT , DC_LIMIT_AMT , USE_ACC_POINT_YN FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MEMBR_CLASS_CD ASC

/* MemberClassMapper.getMemberClassDetail */ SELECT MEMBR_ORGN_CD , MEMBR_CLASS_CD , MEMBR_CLASS_NM , DC_RATE , POINT_SAVE_FG , DEFLT_YN , NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT , FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT , MIN_USE_POINT , ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG , ANVSR_SAVE_POINT , USE_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

/* MemberClassMapper.getMemberClassDetail */ SELECT tmmcpr.MEMBR_ORGN_CD , tmmcpr.MEMBR_CLASS_CD , tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, CONCAT(CONCAT('[', CONCAT(tmmcpr.MEMBR_CLASS_CD, '] ')), tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM) AS MEMBR_CLASS_TYPE, tmmcpr.PAY_CD , tmmcpr.PAY_CD AS INIT_PAY_CD , tmmcpr.ACC_RATE , tmmcpr.REMARK , tmmcpr.REG_DT , tmmcpr.REG_ID , tmmcpr.MOD_DT , tmmcpr.MOD_ID FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS_PAY_RATE tmmcpr LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc ON tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmcpr.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmmcpr.MEMBR_CLASS_CD WHERE tmmcpr.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmcpr.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd} ORDER BY tmmcpr.PAY_CD ASC
mapper.insert: /* MemberClassMapper.insertClassInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS ( MEMBR_ORGN_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_NM, DC_RATE, POINT_SAVE_FG, DEFLT_YN, NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT, FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT, MIN_USE_POINT, ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG, ANVSR_SAVE_POINT, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DC_ACC_POINT_YN, MAX_USE_POINT, DC_LIMIT_AMT, USE_ACC_POINT_YN) VALUES(#{membrOrgnCd}, #{membrClassCd}, #{membrClassNm}, #{dcRate}, #{pointSaveFg}, #{defltYn}, #{newJoinSavePoint}, #{firstSaleSavePoint}, #{minUsePoint}, #{anvsrPointSaveFg}, #{anvsrSavePoint}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{dcAccPointYn}, #{maxUsePoint}, #{dcLimitAmt}, #{useAccPointYn})

/* MemberClassMapper.insertClassPointInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS_PAY_RATE ( MEMBR_ORGN_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_CD, PAY_CD, ACC_RATE, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID) VALUES(#{membrOrgnCd}, #{membrClassCd}, #{payCd}, #{accRate}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId})
